title: Rain from the Danube
creator_credit: Peter Bradford, World Wide Pictures and Sahia Films Bucharest
brief_description: A film showing how the skills of British engineers and equipment were employed in the irrigation of the Danube Basin in Romania; an area of 300 square miles.
